Package m450

Class Summary
Breeder Performs genetic operations on Genome objects
FitnessJudger Judges the Schedule object produced from a Genome object, and assigns an appropriate fitness score to the Genome object
GeneticAlgorithmRunner Drives a Genetic Algorithm to generate a solution
Genome Simulates a chromosome, which encodes a possible Schedule
HillClimbingAlgorithmRunner Drives a Hill Climbing algorithm to generate a solution
Initializer Initializes the system for a student user, with default parameters for the default GA
Main Starts the program in either Scientist Mode or Student Mode.
Module Models an OU Module
ModuleBank Reads in relevant data for modules offered by the OU, and uses it to create and hold Module objects
Output Displays the recommended schedules for the student user
PopRecord Holds a record of the key statistics for a population at a particular stage, including which generation the population is at, how many millisaconds have elapsed since the algorithm began, the fitness score and the bitString of the fittest member, and the mean fitness score of the entire population.
Population Holds all the Genomes in one generation
PopulationVisualiser Provides an on-screen visual representation of a Population object
RouletteSelector Responsible for creating the next generation of genomes, based on the previous generation, using a biased roulette wheel
Schedule A possible solution, decoded from the Genome object into a series of months, some of which hold start dates for modules
ScheduleVisualiser Provides a visual on-screen representation of a Schedule object
StatCollector Performs runs and collects statistics
StatVisualiser Provides a visual on-screen representation of a the results of a series of runs
Student Models the preferences of a student, such as which modules they wish to study and the max monthly hours they want to spend studying It is used by the system to create and evaluate Schedules
StudyMonth Models a calendar month, in which a module may start or be in progress
TournamentSelector Responsible for creating the next generation of genomes, based on the previous generation, using Tournament selection
 

Enum Summary
AlgorithmType  
Mode  
SelectionType  
VisType
